评论详情: I normally think of baby tees hitting right at my belly button whereas cropped would be shorter so this fits more like a crop top, I think. It is still so cute though and I wear it often.

I liked the tee, and I wear it. The only thing I will say is the material is quite weird, it is not cotton like at all. The sleeves cut off strangely, and I don't like having my shoulders highlighted so. Over all it is a 3/5.

I'm a 38C, typically a L/XL, 5'2", and 187lbs. I bought this in a large and was pleasantly surprised at how cute it turned out to be. It's definitely cropped and sits above my belly button slightly, but the cut of the shirt is cute. The material is cotton-y, but the shiny cheap type, which I expected when buying it. The lettering is not those weird shiny, ironed on letter either, which is great. I bought this for an Olivia Rodrigo concert and I think it'll do just fine for the purpose, but I don't think I'll wear it outside of that since it is pretty low quality.
Bestie loved it, she’s a larger chested gal and the normal size L fit perfect!

评论概述: Was apprehensive but turned out great
评论详情: Usually Amazon tshirts are a hit or miss. This top was surprisingly high quality and the letters have stayed on well, and are not super shiny or cheap looking like I thought they’d be. Feels like a nice cotton shirt with a lot of stretch to it, didnt shrink too much in the wash either. If you’re looking for a tighter fit then size down.
I did not need this product anymore so I returned it, but it was cute & fairly good quality!

Fits perfectly and the quality is exactly like the picture. It's stretchy too so that's AWESOME! I get a little nervous about ordering these things online cause the quality could go downhill so fast but I definitely recommend this. It fits exactly like it says it does and the fabric isn't uncomfortable at all. All in all it's super cute!
It’s the perfect cut and size, doesn’t fade! Letters haven’t faded or peeled. 10/10 recommend!
If you’re looking for a cute graphic tee you should buy this . Highly recommended
Opening it and realizing I got a medium I was worried at first, then when I put it on I couldn’t take it off LOL. Came back to buy another funny soft T and figured I’d leave a review

The quality is way better than expected, i love the fit, im normally a Large or XL and my arms are a little bigger and the larg fit perfect. It’s soft & stretchy & the color is vibrant. 10/10 reccomend love the brittney vibes 💋

Got it to wear on galentines day but now wear it whenever, it’s a and casual cute baby tee, but it is a bit spandex-y and I feel like it’ll shrink if washed in warm water so it’s not the highest quality
The font on the shirt was different from the picture  the shirt was good quality though!

评论概述: It’s exactly what you’re looking for
评论详情: If you too were in search of a dupe for britney’s juicy couture “dump him” baby tee…here it is. It’s just a tad more cropped that hers, but other than that almost identical.
the material is hella weird like it’s not cotton. also took like 3 weeks to arrive. it’s a weird length too
not too long or too short, quality rlly good. length is accurate in person as it is in the pictures

I ordered the light pink shirt and was sooo impressed with it! Was not expecting it to be as nice as it is. I ordered a medium and am a 34B and 5”8. I have broad shoulders so was scared it would be too small but it was perfect!
